basic_information.scholarship_name: Peggy Kates Endowed Scholarship in Biology

description: Mission: Scholarship will benefit a student majoring in Biology. Eligibility Requirements Must be majoring in Biology Must have a 3.5 GPA Must have completed 60 credit hours Two letters of recommendation

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major is Biology   or SIS_Major is Biology-Biomedical Sciences   or SIS_Major is Biology-Medical Laboratory Sci   or SIS_Major is Biology-Pre-Dental   or SIS_Major is Biology-Pre-Medical   or SIS_Major is Biology-Pre-Optometry   or SIS_Major is Biology-Pre-Veterinary Med
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major is Biology   or SIS_Major is Biology-Biomedical Sciences   or SIS_Major is Biology-Medical Laboratory Sci   or SIS_Major is Biology-Pre-Dental   or SIS_Major is Biology-Pre-Medical   or SIS_Major is Biology-Pre-Optometry   or SIS_Major is Biology-Pre-Veterinary Med
criteria.clean_description: Major: Biology, Biology-Biomedical Sciences, Biology-Medical Laboratory Sci, Biology-Pre-Dental, Biology-Pre-Medical, Biology-Pre-Optometry, Biology-Pre-Veterinary Med

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
